title: Carnival camper
excerpt: Every year the carnival comes to town once or twice and this is one of their campers. If Papa was designing a camper van it would look like this. It’s very Tom Waits.

title: Alberta
excerpt: We found this little baby bird injured and took her home. We called her Alberta.
content: We found this little baby bird injured and took her home. We called her Alberta.

title: Riu the gymnast
Old bicycles
excerpt:
We found these two really old bicycles in the gully behind the house, bound together by a tree that has grown up through them. The are probably from the civil war era.







We will try to preserve them in some way, maybe display them on a wall.
content:
We found these two really old bicycles in the gully behind the house, bound together by a tree that has grown up through them. The are probably from the civil war era.







We will try to preserve them in some way, maybe display them on a wall.

It’s probably the best-appointed hostel in the mountains. That’s it there at the edge of the lake. Beautiful photograph from Rebecca.



We walked there, and it was a long way. Even Saoirse walked some of the way, but not much.







Looking down on the refugi from higher up the mountain.



On the way down, it rained for a little while, so Riu put on her poncho.







Beautiful Boí.

Gina and Gemma and Gina and Boí.
